reviews.text: OK - here is the disclaimer. If you go to a KOA, you know what the set up will be approximately: shared laundry facilities, clean and cosy wood cabins, RV hookups, campsites, banana bikes for hire, a little store, maybe TV, maybe internet. Also, don't forget that you will be sharing the campground with other people who potentially may be different to you. You may be driving a car, they may be driving motorbikes.
reviews.title: Management made all the difference - recommended
